name: Zumu War Marble
description:
Zumu War Marble is a brand new and amazing match-3 game!
In Zumu War Marble, you must survive in four secret scenes to get the legendary treasure! Win all the levels, and try to get three stars!
How to play:
- Shoot marbles to match 3 or more of the same color
- Tap on the transmitter to exchange the position between current ball and next

Features:
- Very small size
- Easy to learn, but hard to master
- Stunning effects and soundtracks
- Many challenging levels
